Translations.Text: jab allaah ne kahaah he eesa! main tujhe poornatah lene vaala tatha apanee or uthaane vaala hoon tatha tujhe kaafiron se pavitr (mukt) karane vaala hoon tatha tere anuyaayiyon ko pralay ke din tak kaafiron ke oopar[1] karane vaala hoon. phir tumhaara lautana meree hee or hai. to main tumhaare beech us vishay mein nirnay kar doonga, jisamen tum vibhed kar rahe ho
phir jo kaafir ho gaye, unhen lok-pralok mein kadee yaatana doonga tatha unaka koee sahaayak na hoga
tatha jo eemaan laaye aur sadaachaar kiye, to unhen unaka bharapoor pratiphal doonga tatha allaah atyaachaariyon se prem nahin karata
(he nabee!) ye hamaaree aayaten aur tatvagyata kee shiksha hai, jo ham tumhen suna rahe hain
vastutah allaah ke paas eesa kee misaal aisee hee hai[1], jaise aadam kee. use (arthaat, aadam ko) mittee se utpann kiya, phir usase kahaah "ho ja" to vah ho gaya
ye aapake paalanahaar kee or se saty[1] hai, atah aap sandeh karane vaalon mein na hon

phir aapake paas gyaan aa jaane ke pashchaat koee aapase eesa ke vishay mein vivaad kare, to kaho ki aao, ham apane putron tatha tumhaare putron aur apanee striyon tatha tumhaaree striyon ko bulaate hain aur svayan ko bhee, phir allaah se savinay praarthana karen ki allaah kee dhikkaar mithyaavaadiyon par[1] ho
vaastav mein, yahee saty varnan hai tatha allaah ke siva koee poojy nahin. nishchay allaah hee prabhutvashaalee tatvagy hai
phir bhee yadi ve munh[1] pheren, to nihsandeh allaah upadraviyon ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai
